conversations.speaker: User
conversations.message: This is PERSON_LASTNAME_2 from SMU Libraries. How may I help you?

conversations.speaker: User
conversations.message: Hi PERSON_LASTNAME_2, I have one website that I am unclear of how should I cite it (APA & In-text) can I check with you?

conversations.speaker: User
conversations.message: Could you share the link with me?

conversations.speaker: User
conversations.message: May I check, how should the in-text citation be done then?

conversations.speaker: User
conversations.message: I see alright, thank you for your help!

conversations.speaker: Help Desk
conversations.message: Sure, I'm able to help on your quick question!

conversations.speaker: Help Desk
conversations.message: Please give me a moment to have a look :)

conversations.speaker: Help Desk
conversations.message: I think you can cite it as a general webpage. So, you can follow the citation format for general website:https://researchguides.smu.edu.sg/c.php?g=421741&p=6627441#s-lg-box-21085111

conversations.speaker: Help Desk
conversations.message: Besides, I found this webpage https://valenciacollege.edu/students/learning-support/winter-park/communications/tip-sheets.php where there is the link to the online PDF.

conversations.speaker: Help Desk
conversations.message: So, you can figure out the author which is Communications Student Support Center for the online PDF.
